name: Lego Star Gatherers
description:
Title: Lego Star Gatherers

Name of Game Platform: PC web browser

Platformer Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+

Game Overview: Navigate through a Lego landscape to collect all the stars! Watch out for the gingerbread boss!

Instructions: use WASD and SPACE to move, use mouse to look around, collect all 10 stars

Game Design Team: Blaine Grimes - Game Designer
